oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three soldiers on patrol

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three soldiers on patrol in the Iron Triangle. The soldier in the middle is carrying an AN/PRC-25 radio strapped to his back.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military personnel; Soldiers; Military uniforms; Arms & armament; Helmets; Radios
United States. Army. Infantry Division, 1st; Vietnam War, 1961-1975; Vietnam
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ammons, Christopher D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Iron Triangle was a 120-square-mile Viet Cong stronghold in the Binh Duong Province.
